languages.text: {n}Идира шмыгает носом и мягко говорит:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, да полно вам, пощадите шкета. Перенервничал малясь, вот и лыку не вяжет. Дурачок он просто, не чую в нем коварства".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира шмыгает носом и мягко говорит:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, да полно вам, пощадите шкета. Перенервничал малясь, вот и лыку не вяжет. Дурачок он просто, не чую в нем коварства".

languages.text: {n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "Reconsider, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been so awfully stressed, it's a wonder he can even talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира шмыгает носом и мягко говорит:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, да полно вам, пощадите шкета. Перенервничал малясь, вот и лыку не вяжет. Дурачок он просто, не чую в нем коварства".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "For goodness' sake, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been stressing so awfully he can barely talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

{n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "For goodness' sake, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been stressing so awfully he can barely talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

{n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "Reconsider, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been so awfully stressed, it's a surprise he can even talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

{n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "Reconsider, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been so awfully stressed, it's a surprise he can even talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

{n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "Reconsider, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been so awfully stressed, it's a wonder he can even talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

{n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "Reconsider, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been so awfully stressed, it's a wonder he can even talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

languages.text: {n}Idira schnieft und sagt mit sanfter Stimme:{/n} "Bitte überlegt es Euch noch einmal, Lord Captain, habt Gnade mit dem Jungen. Er steht unter einem solchen Stress, es ist ein Wunder, dass er überhaupt sprechen kann. Er ist einfach nur ein wenig einfältig. Ich spüre keinerlei List in ihm."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "Reconsider, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been so awfully stressed, it's a wonder he can even talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schnieft und sagt mit sanfter Stimme:{/n} "Bitte überlegt es Euch noch einmal, Lord Captain, habt Gnade mit dem Jungen. Er steht unter einem solchen Stress, es ist ein Wunder, dass er überhaupt sprechen kann. Er ist einfach nur ein wenig einfältig. Ich spüre keinerlei List in ihm."

languages.text: {n}Idira renifle et dit doucement :{/n} « Réfléchissez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ayez pitié de ce garçon. Il a été tellement stressé que c'est un miracle qu'il puisse encore parler. Il est un peu simplet, c'est tout. Je ne sens aucune fourberie en lui. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "Reconsider, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been so awfully stressed, it's a wonder he can even talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira renifle et dit doucement :{/n} « Réfléchissez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ayez pitié de ce garçon. Il a été tellement stressé que c'est étonnant qu'il puisse encore parler. Il est un peu simplet, c'est tout. Je ne sens aucune ruse en lui. »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉嗅了嗅，轻轻地开了口。{/n}“还是再考虑考虑吧，舰长大人。饶了这孩子吧，他被吓坏了，还能说话就已经很不容易了。他只是有点傻乎乎而已，我没看出来他话里藏着什么阴谋诡计。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "Reconsider, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been so awfully stressed, it's a wonder he can even talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉嗅了嗅，轻轻地开了口。{/n}“还是再考虑考虑吧，舰长大人。饶了这孩子吧，他压力太大了，还能说话已经很不容易了。他只是有点傻乎乎而已，我没看出来他话里藏着什么阴谋诡计。”

languages.text: {n}イディラは鼻をすすると、やさしく言いった。{/n}「考え直してください、ロード・キャプテン。その青年にどうか慈悲を与えてやってください。彼は非常にストレスを受けているようで、話せることさえ驚きです。ちょっと単細胞な奴だけなんです。彼には狡猾さは感じられません」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "Reconsider, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been so awfully stressed, it's a wonder he can even talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは鼻をすすると、やさしく言いった。{/n}「考え直してください、ロード・キャプテン。その青年にどうか慈悲を与えてやってください。彼は非常にストレスを受けているようで、話せることさえ驚きです。ちょっと単細胞な奴だけなんです。彼には狡猾さは感じられません」

languages.text: {n}Idira resopla y dice suavemente,{/n} «Recapacite, Lord Capitán, tenga piedad del muchacho. Ha estado tan estresado que es increíble que pueda hablar. Es un poco ingenuo, eso es todo. No percibo malicia en él».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "Reconsider, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been so awfully stressed, it's a wonder he can even talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira resopla y dice suavemente,{/n} «Recapacitad, Lord Capitán, tened piedad del muchacho. Ha estado tan estresado que es increíble que pueda hablar. Es un poco ingenuo, eso es todo. No percibo malicia en él».

languages.text: {n}İdira burun çekip uysalca söze giriyor,{/n} "Tekrar bir düşünsen Lord Kaptan, bu gence merhamet göstersen. Öylesine stres altında ki konuşabilmesi bile mucize. Biraz avanak birisi sadece, o kadar. İçinde kurnazlık sezmiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sniffs and says gently,{/n} "Reconsider, Lord Captain, have mercy on the boy. He's been so awfully stressed, it's a wonder he can even talk. Bit of a simpleton, that's all. I sense no cunning in him."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira burun çekip uysalca söze giriyor,{/n} "Tekrar bir düşünsen Lord Kaptan, bu gence merhamet göstersen. Öylesine stres altında ki konuşabilmesi bile mucize. Biraz avanak birisi sadece, o kadar. İçinde kurnazlık sezmiyorum."
